instructions.p1: In this experiment, you will play a series of games.
instructions.p2:
Each game asks you to bet on whether a (virtual) jar of beads
contains more (60%) orange or more (60%) blue beads.
instructions.fixation:
Throughout the experiment, you'll see this fixation point at the center of the screen.
Fixate your eyes on this black fixation point.
instructions.money:
Before each game starts, you will see 2 money bags indicating the amount of money you earn for correctly betting
on whether the jar contains mostly blue or mostly orange beads.
instructions.money2:
In this example, you will win $100 if you corectly bet that the jar contains more blue beads,
and $20 if you correctly bet if the jar contains more orange beads.
instructions.wrongBet: If you bet incorrectly, you will lose $10.
instructions.draw:
You can draw a bead from the virtual jar.
Each time you draw a bead, it costs $0.10 (10 cents).
instructions.showBeads:
Some beads will already be drawn for you, but you may draw more beads if you like.
There are trials where it may make sense to draw more, to draw less, or to bet right away.
instructions.buttons:
After you see the beads that have already been drawn from the jar,
you will be given the option to bet or to draw another bead.
instructions.earnings: After you bet, you will see your earnings for that game on the screen in green if you win money and in red if you lose money.
